summary: Story about director Apichatpong Weerasethakul's parents who were both doctors, and director's memories about growing up in the hospital environment.
cast: Nantarat Sawaddikul|Jaruchai Iamaram|Sophon Pukanok|Jenjira Pongpas|Arkanae Cherkam|Sakda Kaewbuadee|Nu Nimsomboon|Wanna Wattanajinda|Sin Kaewpakpin|Putthithorn Kammak|Manasanant Porndispong|Apirak Mitrpracha|Norathep Panyanavakij|Nitipong Thinthupthai|Rangsan Sutthimaneenun|Kasansaeng Kamnerdmee|Kosin Wongtes|Thanawat Thampreechapong|Jarunee Saengtupthim
title: Sang sattawat
